product_name: 3M Scotch Anti-Bacterial Titanium Detachable Kitchen Scissors
features: Detachable blades for easier and more thorough cleaning
Anti-Bacterial Blade & Handle Reduce Bacterial Growth
Nonstick Oil Repelling Titanium Coated Blades for Easy Cleaning
Treated with 3M's Electro-Polishing Process to Prevent Corrosion
Soft Streamlined Handles to Help Relieve Stress on Fingers & Providing More Comfortable Grip
Colour-coded scissors can help minimize the probability of cross-contamination, lessening the possibility of poisoning through cross-contamination.
